bill.title: Relating To State Holidays.
bill.description: Establishes July 31 of each year as La Hoihoi Ea. (CD1)

history.action: Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to CAI, JHA, FIN, referral sheet 3
Bill scheduled to be heard by CAI on Wednesday, 02-02-22 10:30AM in House conference room 329 Via Videoconference.

The committees on CAI recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Gates, Tam, Har, Kapela, Nishimoto, Yamane, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from CAI (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 107-22) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JHA.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JHA with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Luke, McDermott excused (2).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JHA on Wednesday, 02-16-22 2:00PM in House conference room 325 Via Videoconference.

The committees on JHA recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Matayoshi, Ichiyama, D. Kobayashi, LoPresti, McKelvey, Nakamura, Takumi, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Lowen, Tokioka.
Reported from JHA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 624-22), recommending referral to FIN.
Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Eli, Kapela excused (2).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 02-23-22 2:00PM in House conference room 308 Via Videoconference.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 15 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Yamashita, Branco, Eli, Holt, Ilagan, B. Kobayashi, Marten, Nishimoto, Perruso, Sayama, Tam, Todd, Wildberger, McDermott; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 710-22), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) McDermott voting no (1) and Representative(s) Matayoshi, Todd excused (2). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 94).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to HWN/LCA, WAM.
The committee(s) on HWN/LCA has scheduled a public hearing on 03-22-22 1:00PM; Conference Room 016 & Videoconference.

The committee(s) on LCA recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in LCA were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, Ihara, Keohokalole, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Chang.

The committee(s) on HWN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HWN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Shimabukuro, Keohokalole, Acasio, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara.
Reported from HWN/LCA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3482) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 04-08-22 10:30AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WAM were as follows: 10 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Keith-Agaran, Kanuha, Kidani, Misalucha, Moriwaki, Shimabukuro, Taniguchi, Wakai, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Inouye.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3942) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
One Day Notice 04-12-22.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 860) in amended form (SD 1).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 715).
House Conferees Appointed: Gates, Nakashima, Tam Co-Chairs; Har, Kapela, Ward.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 718).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Shimabukuro Chair; Taniguchi, Kanuha Co-Chairs; Fevella.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 904).
Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Thursday, 04-28-22 11:00AM in conference room 224.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Gates, Nakashima, Tam, Kapela; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Har, Ward.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Shimabukuro, Taniguchi, Kanuha, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 87-22) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday 05-03-22.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 87-22).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 05-03-22.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 946).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 824).
Transmitted to Governor.

votes.desc: House Culture, Arts, & International Affairs: Passed, With Amendments
House Judiciary & Hawaiian Affairs: Passed, Unamended
Senate Labor, Culture and the Arts: Passed, With Amendments
Senate Hawaiian Affairs: Passed, With Amendments
Senate Ways and Means: Passed, Unamended
